DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety tolerability single- multiple dos Lu AE58054 healthy young Japanese men comparison Caucasian men .
DOC.brief_title: Study Investigating Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetic Properties Lu AE58054 Healthy Japanese Caucasian Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: The study conduct two part . Part A consist two cohort ( name cohort A1 A2 ) , randomise , double-blind , parallel-group , placebo-controlled , single- multiple dose regimen investigate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics Lu AE58054 healthy young men . Part B consist one cohort , B1 , randomise , open-label , two-way cross-over , single dose investigation effect food pharmacokinetics Lu AE58054 healthy young Japanese men .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Japanese ( Japanese passport , four Japanese grandparent , life outside Japan le 5 year ) Caucasian men age 20 45 year BMI 18 25 kg/m2 ( extremes include ) . The subject , opinion investigator , unlikely comply clinical study protocol unsuitable reason . Other inclusion exclusion criterion may apply .
